pricing.simpleTransparentPricingDescription: WorkHoursTracker is designed to grow with your business. Our flexible plans ensure you only pay for what you need, with clear, predictable costs.
pricing.faq1Q: How is the monthly cost calculated?
pricing.faq1A: Our pricing consists of a base fee of {{baseFee}}€ per month, plus an additional {{perWorkerFee}}€ for each active worker.
pricing.faq2A: No, our pricing is completely transparent. The monthly base fee and per-worker cost are the only charges.
pricing.faq3Q: Can I add or remove workers at any time?
pricing.faq3A: Yes, you can adjust your worker count as needed. Your billing will be prorated accordingly.
pricing.faq4Q: Is there a contract or a minimum commitment period?
pricing.faq4A: No, there are no long-term contracts. You can cancel your subscription at any time.
pricing.faq5Q: What happens if I add more workers?
pricing.faq5A: Extra seats are prorated. You only pay for the remaining days of the billing cycle.
pricing.faq6A: Yes, each worker needs an account to access assignments and track hours.
